text:
The charred body of youth, suspected to have been murdered and burnt, was recovered from the bushes in Bodinaickenpatti on Friday.

Residents found the body between railway tracks in the bushes and informed the police. Water can, empty liquor bottles and empty food packets were also found near the body. Finger print experts were pressed into service.

The police later identified the body as that of Sanjay (26) of Maharashtra who was working at a silver anklet unit in the city. The police sent the body to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.
title: Body found
